831920.name: The Curse of the Golden Crab
831920.description:
After the events in the "Bay of Crows" Capitaine Maurice Deschamps finds himself at a crossroads in life. Will he return to France and seek help from his cousin, the King of France, to gain a pardon and re-take his position in the French Navy or will he remain in his beloved Caribbean in any capacity possible. Fortunately (or unfortunately) for him an encounter with a hilarious Norwegian sailor called "Pretty Boy Dully" seals his fate in an instant!

Features:
  • Extended New Story
  • New characters
  • Return of old loveable characters
